short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A perfect SoccerTab themed extension for your chrome browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Change the background image to feature cool Soccer background. The extension also provides users with a Custom Web Search, and updated soccer highlights

By installing "SoccerTab" extension, you agree to the EULA and Privacy Policy, and to set your default page to SoccerTab.
